name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Traddar Beta for Robinhood and Wealthsimple

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Traddar to easily share your stock trades based on the trade confirmation emails you receive WealthSimple Trade (Canada) through your Twitter account to show your verified completed trades and learn from other traders. 

Get started in 30 seconds:
1) Install this Chrome Extension
2) Connect your Gmail
3) Connect your Twitter

Once that’s done, we’ll send out your first Tweet based on a WealthSimple (Canada) trade confirmation, if there have been any within the last 2 days.

Moving forward, within 15 minutes of a trade confirmation hitting your email, we will automatically Tweet it out to your audience.

Support for Robinhood is coming soon.
